description.p: Compute the average value of the expression over all rows that satisfy the expression.
Returns the average value of the expression.

discussion.p: The Avg function computes the average value of the expression over all rows that satisfy the expression.

example.caption: Avg() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT Avg(Order_Details.Discount) AS AvgDiscount FROM [Order Details] Order_Details =0.056167054202261
